Articles.Content:
so i cheated some science points from the save file of persistant.sfs then load ksp then this screen pops up saying:There are incompatible/invalid saves on your saves folder

what would you like to do

(warning: upgrading saves may not work for all cases)

*presses attempt upgrade*

doesnt respond to anything...

also theres delete and not now

also i have steam ksp
Did you delete or move the folder by accident?

Do you have any mods?

Also, did you exit to the menu before editing?

The "upgrading saves" thing sounds like the message that was produced when .21 broke saves, but Harvester made a save updater. Did you change the version number in the persistence fie? It should be .23.
What mods, and did you go to the main menu before you began editing?

the mods i have is boat parts r3 and r4, builderCo,KAS,Kethane,KMP,PlanetFactory,SCANsat,cleverwalrus,romfarer,core_anvil_172,chatterer,alternis kerbol,flags,kerbaltek,

and squad and i quit before editing

Edited January 29, 2014 by Jupiter02

Check persistent.sfs see if the file is corrupted, just happened to me. If so, take a backup or a quicksave and rename it to persistent.sfs, You can pretty much kiss that persistent file goodbye if it is corrupt. They need to fix this.
I just did it with mine, it works
Well, if steam hasn't uploaded the save to the cloud you can reinstall the game and you might get your save back.

Did you modify the right value? Science is "sci = ", not anything else.

Also, replace your persistent.sfs file with your quicksave.sfs and everything should be fine.
It was nice of you folks to offer help today, but this thread is 4 months old and is not talking about the current version of the game. These suggestions may no longer be applicable.
